Description: The age of the individual in years.
The gender of the individual (male or female).
Body Mass Index, a value derived from the weight and height of the individual.
The number of children or dependents covered by the insurance policy for the individual.
Indicates whether the individual is a smoker ('yes' or 'no').
The geographical region in the US where the individual resides (e.g., southwest, southeast, northwest, northeast).
The medical insurance charges billed to the individual, in dollars.
